message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! However, I've invested a lot in this product, and I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I can offer you a compromise - I'll sell it to you for $135. It's a great price, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $135. I'm willing to go up to $125, but that's my final offer. Can you meet me there?

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob! However, I've already compromised a lot on the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $125 and $135, which is $130. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a fair price for this amazing product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $127.50, but that's my final offer. Can you consider it?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll sell it to you for $132.50, but that's as low as I can go. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $129.50, but that's my final offer. Can you consider it?

I've already compromised a lot, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $135, and I think we've been close enough on the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $129.50 and $135, which is $132.25. It's my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $131.50, but that's my final offer. Can you consider it?
